data.title: Shakti Ratna Puraskar
data.meta_description: Erams Entertainment & Mumbai Raftar presents SHAKTI RATNA PURASKAR - 2022 Erams Entertainment Producer Eram Faridi with Mumbai Raftaar News CEO Shailesh Patel and Khabar 24 editor Pushkar Ojha honoured.Salim Mapkhan, Actress Niharika Raizada, Abhijit Rane, Dilip Sen, Ali Khan, Arun Bakshi, Ram Shankar, Sneha Shankar, Sunil Pal, VIP, Ashwin Kaushal, Dolphin Dubey, Nutan Jayant,…
data.text:
Erams Entertainment & Mumbai Raftar presents

SHAKTI RATNA PURASKAR – 2022

Erams Entertainment Producer Eram Faridi with Mumbai Raftaar News CEO Shailesh Patel and Khabar 24 editor Pushkar Ojha honoured.

Salim Mapkhan, Actress Niharika Raizada, Abhijit Rane, Dilip Sen, Ali Khan, Arun Bakshi, Ram Shankar, Sneha Shankar, Sunil Pal, VIP, Ashwin Kaushal, Dolphin Dubey, Nutan Jayant, Jenny Jazzinger Ravika, Aparna Nainer, producer-actor Shantanu Bhamre and many more Celebrities were present

Mumbai, The International Women’s Day week, on March 11, 2022, a grand event of ‘Shakti Ratna Award 2022’ presented by Mumbai Raftaar News and Khabar 24 was held at the Mayor Hall of Mumbai. Producer and social activist Eram Faridi and Shailesh Patel and Pushkar Ojha presented police, doctors, social workers,

Awarded Shakti Ratna Award to Bollywood celebrities and journalists. All of them are known for their valuable contribution while doing excellent work in the field of society and human service.

Ajay Kaul and Prashant Kashid, founder of Ekta Manch, founder of Jaibhim App, Girish Wankhede, founder of Global Sunshine Suraj Mate, Ramkumar Pal of BJP National Executive Kisan Morcha gave special support in this program.

Awarded Shakti Ratna Award to Bollywood celebrities and journalists.

Eram Faridi, Ram Kumar Pal, Salim Mapkhan, Babita, Aruna Nabha, Dolphin Dubey, Nutan Jayant, Renu Kaushal, Juned Shaiikh, Dev Agnihotri, Samrin Mohd Iqbal Ansari started the program by lighting the lamp.

Singer Ravika sang the song Aajib Dastaan. Mona played the host on the stage. Juned Shaiikh Associate Producer of Erams Entertainment, also shared his experiences on stage. Aruna Nabh told that during the Corona period and lockdown, she helped a lot of people and started Life Hand Foundation. I have received the Shakti Ratna Award 2022 for which I am grateful.

Such a scene is rarely seen when only women were being seen on the stage. When several dozen women came on stage, an example of women’s empowerment came to the fore.

Such a scene is rarely seen when only women were being seen on the stage. When several dozen women came on stage, an example of women’s empowerment came to the fore.

Ashwin Kaushal, Director of Eram Faridi’s film ‘Meet Mr Chang’ was also present at the award show. Eram Faridi honoured Girish Wankhede (Jai Bhim App) by giving him a shawl and a bouquet. He was also awarded the Shakti Ratna Award 2022.

Babita Obhan (Babita Designer Wear), Aruna Nabh (Life Hand Foundation), Ramkumar Pal, Chintan Vashi Choreographer, Sajni Srivastava, Salim Mapkhan, Renu Kaushal, Farida Hassan Khan ( Best Social Activist ) Aleem Khan ( Businessman of the Year), Vikas Mahte (Looks like PM Modi) received this prestigious award. ), Surekha Pramod (Social Activist), Sachin (Sachin Enterprises), Rajesh Kanojia, MNS leader Akash Patil (Malad Assembly) was awarded.

Abhijit Rane received this award and said that many thanks to Eram Faridi, Shailesh Patel and Pushkar, these people organized a wonderful program.

Actress Niharika Raizada, Music Composer and Singer Ram Shankar, Singer Sneha Shaker, Dolphin Dubey, Neta Pappu Thakur, Avinash Goyal, Jyoti Singh, Ravika Duggal (Singer), Prarthana (Makeup Artist), Actress Nutan Jayant, Jenny at the Shakti Ratna Award ceremony Jazz, Ranjan Kumar Singh (TV Serial Director), Comedian VIP, Mimicry artist Dhvani Pawar, producer-actor Shantanu Bhamre, social worker Kanchan Shoor, union leader Abhijit Rane, police commissioner Priyatama Muthe, Poonam Mirgane from Juhu Police, director Ashwin Kaushal, music composer Dilip Sen, actor-singer Arun Bakshi, litterateur Rajni Sahu ‘Sudha ‘, Film Journalist Rekha Khan, Gayatri Sahu, Make-up Artist Farida S. Fidai, Rupal Mohta, Deepu Sharma (Lady Manoj Kumar), Dr. Mukesh Bhatia of Age Healthy Health were honored.

Comedian VIP’s daughter Dhvani mimicked many actors on stage including Kangana Ranaut. Also Eram Faridi’s short film ‘Tarpan’ was shown. Its director Ashutosh Singh was also present. Another film of this production house is ‘Disconnected’ which is based on the Corona period.

Shakti Ratna Award 2022 Trophy

Juned Shaiikh for Contribution towards Women Entrepreneurship & Empowerment, Dr. Bharti Chhabria, Darshana (Makeup Artist), Sharda, Anjali Patel, Dr. Chandrakala Singh, Bhavni Goswami, Abhilash Choudhary(Actor) , Abhishek Khanna, Dev Agnihotri (Event Show Director), Faizali Mushtaque Wagle Dr. Mukesh Bhatia, Prashant Dhaga, Ayesha Khan, Zubair Khan, Mayur, Niharika Sharma, Kusum Sharma, Sarita Tripathi, Director Kumar Raj, Actress Mini Bansal, Photographer Ramakant Munde, Singer Aparna Nayanar, Neeta Desai, Payal Shivani UK, Rajesh Yadav, Alka (Social Worker), Aarti (Yoga Therapist), Aditi, Dr. Rajaram Laxminarayan Tripathi (Chairman Winner Group and Royal Diamond Palmosa International Marketing), Dr. Uttam Shantaram Jadhav, Dr. Uttam Shantaram Jadhav, Excellence in Training and Development System Jadhav from Pride Education, Zubair Khan, Excellence in Management from Zubair Khan, Excellence in Creative Designers Mayur Khandeka, Ajay Raaz, Mona, Priyanka Patil, Swati Lanke were also awarded. All of them are acclaimed for their remarkable contribution to the society.

Special Thanks to our Erams Entertainment Management Team

Dev Agnihotri, Deepak Sethi, Aisha Khan, Security Staff & PR Media BrandZarchi’s Samrin Mohammed Iqbal Ansari
